meta-tags.description: My name is Julian Varo, I am a freelance web developer. I am a passionate of UX and improving the applications' performance.

home.phrase: I love building beautiful applications that generate value for the people.

about.paragraph-1: My first steps in coding were in high school, solving some exercises. Although I was interested in the subject and I was curious to learn more, I set it aside because I was mainly focused on playing football (soccer) and learning about sports.
about.paragraph-2: In 2022 I returned to programming to find what I couldn't have seen before. After some searches and investigations, web development got my attention and I decided to go deeper.
about.paragraph-3: I learned through different resources from web and building projects. Now, I am exploring and improving my skills to develop a better software and give a better experience to the user.

form.title: Send me a message
form.name: Name
form.message-placeholder: Hi, I'm interested in having a chat with you about...
form.message-missing: The message could not be empty
form.message-length: Your message must be at least 15 characters long
